com.ibm.dm.frontService.sm.service
Class SmPlainMediationModule

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.dm.frontService.sm.service.SmPlainMediationModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISmModuleIntercept
public class SmPlainMediationModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISmModuleIntercept

A default null mediation module which passes the input model as is to the output.

Author:
shani

invoke

public boolean invoke(IOntologyHandle sourceOntology,
                      IInputModelHandle sourceModel,
                      IOntologyHandle targetOntology,
                      IRulesHandle mediationRules,
                      IOutputModelHandle targetModel)
               throws MediationException
This implementation assumes that the ontologies are null.

Specified by:
invoke in interface ISmModuleIntercept
Parameters:
sourceOntology - OntologyHandle for the input (source) ontology model.
sourceModel - ModelHandle for the (input) Model to be mediated.
targetOntology - OntologyHandle for the output (target) ontology model.
mediationRules - OntologyHandle for the ontology containing rules to govern the mediation.
targetModel - ModelHandle for the (output) Model of the mediated input model.
Returns:
boolean to indicate if (true) further processing is required in a chain of mediators (in case the container implements such an option.
Throws:
MediationException

Specified by:
invoke in interface ISmModuleIntercept

sourceModel - ModelHandle for the (input) Model to be mediated.

tearDown

public boolean tearDown()
Description copied from interface: ISmModuleIntercept
Kills the resources used by this module in case the container implements a pool of modules so that this module can release all its allocated resources.
Can be called only once at the end of the lifetime of a module.

Specified by:

Returns:
